title: Interface Exception Collector Service - Schema Index
description: Index of all event schemas used by the Interface Exception Collector Service

inboundEvents.description: Events consumed by the Exception Collector Service

OrderRejected.description: Order rejection events from Order Service

OrderCancelled.description: Order cancellation events from Order Service

CollectionRejected.description: Collection rejection events from Collection Service

DistributionFailed.description: Distribution failure events from Distribution Service

ValidationError.description: Schema validation errors from any interface service

outboundEvents.description: Events published by the Exception Collector Service

ExceptionCaptured.description: Published when new exception is captured and stored

ExceptionResolved.description: Published when exception is fully resolved
